def: Having the anterior scutes extending around the tarsus on theinner side; -- said of certain birds.
The magnetism developed by a current of electricity; thescience which treats of the development of magnetism by means ofvoltaic electricity, and of the properties or actions of the currentsevolved.
Relating to evolution; as, evolutionary discussions.
Any plant of the genus Lithospermum, herbs having a fruitcomposed of four stony nutlets.
A constitutional disease characterized by the production oftubercles in the internal organs, and especially in the lungs, whereit constitutes the most common variety of pulmonary consumption.
Repeating; iterating; as, an iterant echo. Bacon.
In company with others; unitedly; concurrently. Bp. pearson.
To make verses.I'll versify in spite, and do my best. Dryden.

The act of apportioning; a dividing into just proportions orshares; a division or shares; a division and assignment, to eachproprietor, of his just portion of an undivided right or property. A.Hamilton.
